summary: This mod add : a new weapon.
descriptionHtml:
Translated by Paneb from the Brotherhood of translators (French community)

Description:
============

This mod adds: 
-a new weapon one hand, Naru\'s Blade (The spell does 30 points of fire damage)
-a book, Naru\'s story
-a new NPC, Johnson. He has the two items and could be found in the Ratway.

Update: 
========
-2.1 : Add fix blade rapidity.
-2.5 : Add a translation of text and colourisation
-2.5 : Add two hand version



Installation:
=============
Copy the \"Data\" folder where your game is installed (where Steam is).
So: ...\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim.
Trigger the .esp in the mod manager.

I advise to use the Nexus Mod Manager in order to make installation easier.


Uninstall:
==========
1. Deactivate the mod in your mod manager.
2. Delete the files in your \"Data\" folder.
3. That\'s all!


Thanks:
=======
To Bethesda for this game and the Elder Scrollsâ€™ universe
To Paneb for translation
To Higeyosi for the mesh of blade two hand.


My website (french website) : http://cheznarugatsutositedemodskyrim.weebly.com/
author: Narugatsuto
